name: Tame the Coots
description:
Tame the Coots
A game made for the Ludwig Jam 2023

You play as Ludwig, who recently got a cat for his girlfriend and now has to tame it. You can feed it treats and play with toys. He might get mad if you feed him too much or play too rough with him. It's up to you to find the perfect balance between treat time and playtime in order to tame such a beast.

The game was inspired by this Ludwig video:

Controls

WASD to move

Left-Click to throw Treats

Right-Click to throw Toys

ESC key to close game

Game shouldn't take more than 5 minutes to complete.

Hope you all enjoy!

Made with Game Maker Studio
